Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Talimogene laherparepvec is approved to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Melanoma in the skin and lymph nodes that cannot be removed by surgery. It is used as local treatment in patients whose disease has come back after being treated with surgery.

Section.Para: Talimogene laherparepvec is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
